price: 64. Tokkel sinni nafsî fanah gaceeniih cubbussu heen waqdi, makot yaniinim sinnik yubleenih, diggah daalimiinih yan mari siini yaabe waytam taqbuden waqdi sittak iyyen.
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
